Plugins - Functionality

Plugins in this category add functionality to command parsing.

class symcalc.plugins.plugins_functionality.AutoExact

Calculator plugin to convert numbers to their SymPy exact form

Calculator >>> 1.2
6/5
Calculator >>> 324.12
8103
────
 25

Initializes the plugin

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the plugin

  • priority (int) – The priority of the plugin. Lower numbers designate that a plugin should be run before others

class symcalc.plugins.plugins_functionality.AutoSymbol

Calculator plugin to automatically assume that undefined variables are symbols

Calculator >>> x
New symbol: x
x
Calculator >>> x
x
Calculator >>> yz
New symbol: yz
yz

Initializes the plugin

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the plugin

  • priority (int) – The priority of the plugin. Lower numbers designate that a plugin should be run before others
